title: From Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: Monster High™: Boo York, Boo York
text:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION – BLU-RAY™ COMBO PACK: Street Date: September 29, 2015 Copyright: 2015 Universal Studios. All Rights Reserved. Selection Numbers: 63166635 (US)/ 63166607 (CDN) Running Time: 1 Hour 12 Minutes Layers: BD-50 Technical Info: DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1 Subtitles: English, Spanish, French 
Street Date: September 29, 2015 Copyright: 2015 Universal Studios. All Rights Reserved. Selection Numbers: 63166617 (US)/ 63166614 (CDN) Running Time: 1 Hour 12 Minutes Layers: Dual Layer Aspect Ratio: Anamorphic Widescreen 1.78:1 Technical Info: Dolby Digital 5.1 Subtitles: English, Spanish, French For artwork, please log on to our website at www.ushepublicity.com For more information, please visit monsterhigh.com 
About Mattel The Mattel family of companies ( MAT ) is the worldwide leader in the design, manufacture and marketing of toys and family products. Mattel's portfolio of best-selling brands includes Barbie ® , the most popular fashion doll ever produced, Hot Wheels ® , Monster High ® , American Girl ® , Thomas & Friends ® and Fisher-Price ® brands, including Little People ® and Power Wheels ® , MEGA ® Brands, including MEGA BLOKS ® and RoseArt ® , as well as a wide array of entertainment-inspired toy lines. In 2013, Mattel was named one of the "World's Most Ethical Companies" by Ethisphere Magazine and in 2014 ranked No. 5 on Corporate Responsibility Magazine's "100 Best Corporate Citizens" list. With worldwide headquarters in El Segundo, Calif., Mattel's companies employ nearly 30,000 people in 40 countries and territories and sell products in more than 150 nations. At Mattel, we are Creating the Future of Play . Visit us at www.mattel.com , www.facebook.com/mattel or www.twitter.com/mattel . 
MONSTER HIGH and associated trademarks and trade dress are owned by Mattel. ©2015 Mattel. All Rights Reserved. 
iPad® and iPhone® are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. Blu-ray™ and Blu-ray Disc™ are trademarks owned by Blu-ray Disc Association (BDA). 
About Universal Pictures Home Entertainment Universal Pictures Home Entertainment is a unit of Universal Pictures, a division of Universal Studios ( www.universalstudios.com ). Universal Studios is a part of NBCUniversal, one of the world's leading media and entertainment companies in the development, production, and marketing of entertainment, news, and information to a global audience. NBCUniversal owns and operates a valuable portfolio of news and entertainment television networks, a premier motion picture company, significant television production operations, a leading television stations group, world-renowned theme parks, and a suite of leading Internet-based businesses. NBCUniversal is a subsidiary of Comcast Corporation. 
CONTACT: Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: Rebecca Wolfson
